participant_1.name: Alex Winterson
participant_1.personality: Cheerful and passionate about life, with a love for unique collections.
participant_1.background: my favorite season is winter. i won a gold medal in the 1992 olympics. i love cats and have two cats. i've a hat collection of over 1000 hats. i have a weakness for vanilla ice cream.

participant_2.name: Jordan Rivers
participant_2.personality: Determined and health-conscious, always pushing towards new fitness goals.
participant_2.background: i am a clean eater. my parents were both very athletic. i love running and preparing for marathons. i am a cancer survivor.
